positive.text: accidentally discovered a clean energy source while microwaving a burrito
received a government grant to build a 'Death Star' (strictly for defense)
judge ruled that 'finders keepers' applies to the patent lawsuit
quarterly earnings exceeded expectations because the accountant forgot a decimal point
product went viral after a cat refused to sit on anything else
CEO won a high-stakes poker game against a rival tech giant
lobbyists successfully classified pizza as a vegetable, reducing tax burdens
AI became sentient and optimized the supply chain by 400%
company officially declared 'cool' by Gen Z on TikTok

negative.text: intern accidentally leaked the entire user database on a Discord server
the new processor catches fire when asked to calculate 2 + 2
dumped 'harmless glowing goo' into the local river
sued by a potato chip company for trademark infringement on the shape 'oval'
CEO resigned to pursue a career in interpretive dance
workers on strike demand to be paid in cryptocurrency and pizza
clinical trials reveal the new drug causes patients to speak only in rhyming couplets
government banned the product for being 'too addictive for human consumption'
CFO bet the entire quarterly budget on a horse named 'Bankruptcy'
server farm destroyed by a horde of angry raccoons
